column4: Full screen flash works poorly on my 6 year old hp desktop running ubuntu 9.04, anyone know how to fix it (I already tried turning off hardware acceleration which did not fix the problem)
I'm not sure
hardwarespecs ?
few factors can cause this, weak hardware, slow connection, bad dispalydriver; to much refresh of ff in background, wrong codecs
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
when done ..
just call back when ready, ff can also be modified
sudo apt-get install hwinfo && sudo hwinfo                         << for detailed hw-info

sudo hwinfo > hwi.txt   for a comfortable file,  sudo hwinfo | grep vga
sudo hwinfo | pastebinit                                           << give url from terminal here
